DOC.brief_summary: Following obesity surgery gastric bypass ( GBP ) patient usually lose 50 % former obesity within relatively short time ( ~ 2 year ) . But knowledge underlie psychological biological mechanism decline body weight , however , still lack . This project intend investigate whether obesity surgery associate patient ' cognitive ability / gene expression metabolomics .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Gastric Bypass Surgery Cognition Genetics
DOC.criteria: First bariatric surgery More one surgery
